description: Phase offsets, groups delays and delay rates are calculated with respect to a specified referance antenna by a two-dimensional FFT and subsequent least-squares optimisation.

parameters.info: Name of input visibility file
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Name of output gain calibration table
parameters.name: caltable

parameters.info: Select field using field id(s) or field name(s)
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: Select spectral window/channels
parameters.name: spw

parameters.info: Other data selection parameters
parameters.name: selectdata

parameters.info: Select data based on time range
parameters.name: timerange

parameters.info: Select data based on antenna/baseline
parameters.name: antenna

parameters.info: Scan number range
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Select by observation ID(s)
parameters.name: observation

parameters.info: Optional complex data selection (ignore for now)
parameters.name: msselect
zerorates
parameters.info: Zero delay-rates in solution tabl
Solution interval: egs. 'inf', '60s' (see help)
parameters.name: solint

parameters.info: Data axes which to combine for solve (obs, scan, spw, and/or, field)
parameters.name: combine

parameters.info: Reference antenna name(s)
parameters.name: refant

parameters.info: Reject solutions below this SNR
parameters.name: minsnr

parameters.info: Constrain FFT delay search to a window; a two-element list, units of nanoseconds
parameters.name: delaywindow

parameters.info: Constrain FFT rate search to a window; a two-element list, units of nanoseconds
parameters.name: ratewindow

parameters.info: Maximum number of iterations for least-squares solver
parameters.name: niter

parameters.info: Refine estimates of delay and rate with global least-squares solver
parameters.name: globalsolve

parameters.info: Append solutions to the (existing) table
parameters.name: append

parameters.info: Use callib or traditional cal apply parameters
parameters.name: docallib

parameters.info: Cal Library filename
parameters.name: callib

parameters.info: Gain calibration table(s) to apply on the fly
parameters.name: gaintable

parameters.info: Select a subset of calibrators from gaintable(s)
parameters.name: gainfield

parameters.info: Temporal interpolation for each gaintable (=linear)
parameters.name: interp

parameters.info: Spectral windows combinations to form for gaintables(s)
parameters.name: spwmap

parameters.info: Apply parallactic angle correction on the fly
parameters.name: paran
